name: KnoxRunner
description:
A quick four-player infinite runner, intended to be used for demos and other promo events by Knox Game Design.

Controls are configured for 4 Retrolink SNES-style gamepads, but can be remapped.

You can read more about how I built the procedural generation:

  • Building a Procedurally Generated Platformer
  • Instantiating a Procedurally Generated Platformer in Unity
